org.apache.flink.api.common.functions

接口 CombineFunction<IN,OUT>

  • 类型参数:
    IN - The data type processed by the combine function.
    OUT - The data type emitted by the combine function.
    所有超级接口:
    Function, Serializable

    @Public
public interface CombineFunction<IN,OUT>
extends Function, Serializable
    Generic interface used for combine functions ("combiners"). Combiners act as auxiliaries to a GroupReduceFunction and "pre-reduce" the data. The combine functions typically do not see the entire group of elements, but only a sub-group.

    Combine functions are frequently helpful in increasing the program efficiency, because they allow the system to reduce the data volume earlier, before the entire groups have been collected.

    This special variant of the combine function reduces the group of elements into a single element. A variant that can return multiple values per group is defined in GroupCombineFunction.

    • 方法概要

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      OUT combine(Iterable<IN> values)
      The combine method, called (potentially multiple timed) with subgroups of elements.

    • 方法详细资料

      • combine

        OUT combine(Iterable<IN> values)
     throws Exception
        The combine method, called (potentially multiple timed) with subgroups of elements.
        参数:
        values - The elements to be combined.
        返回:
        The single resulting value.
        抛出:
        Exception - The function may throw Exceptions, which will cause the program to cancel, and may trigger the recovery logic.
